price: Na hakika yeye aliwaonya adhabu yetu; lakini wao waliyatilia shaka hayo maonyo.
footnotes: Na hakika Lut'i aliwahadharisha watu wake vipi mshiko wetu ulivyo mkali, wakatilia shaka maonyo yake kwa kuwa wanamwona mwongo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
